title: Did the websites mention that both Butigig and Greenell were "first" members of the Council of Ministers, lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender?
subtitle: These allegations cannot be true.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In late 2020, news sites reported that Pete Butigig would become the first publicly-known member of the Cabinet of LGBT Ministers after Richard Greenell had described himself in the same way.
